name: Chicken dental formula dry food for cats
description: Hill's® Science Diet® Adult Dental Care Dry Cat Food provides balanced nutrition with precision for dental health and the health of the body as a whole. Clinically proven kibble technology to reduce plaque and tartar. Daily dental protection to freshen the breath. Helps brush your cat's teeth with every bite. Nutrition balanced with 100% accuracy.

name: Tender liver and chicken wet food for adult cats
description: This paté's delicious taste of poultry will please even the fussiest cats. This balanced meal contains vitamins and essential minerals to promote your companion's health. Contains liver, meat broth, meat by-products, chicken, artificial and natural flavours, calcium phosphate, guar gum, potassium chloride, minerals, taurine, salt, vitamins.

name: Dental care dry food for adult cats
description: Vetdiet adult dental health cat food is specially formulated to support your cat's dental health. Our specialized kibble contains sodium hexametaphosphate to help prevent tartar build-up while pea fiber creates a brushing-like action to help remove plaque. The shape and size of the kibble encourage chewing and added peppermint and parsley help keep your cat's breath fresh.

name: Dental care dry food for adult cats
description: Vetdiet adult dental health cat food is specially formulated to support your cat's dental health. Our specialized kibble contains sodium hexametaphosphate to help prevent tartar build-up while pea fiber creates a brushing-like action to help remove plaque. The shape and size of the kibble encourage chewing and added peppermint and parsley help keep your cat's breath fresh.

name: Dental care dry food for adult cats
description: Vetdiet adult dental health cat food is specially formulated to support your cat's dental health. Our specialized kibble contains sodium hexametaphosphate to help prevent tartar build-up while pea fiber creates a brushing-like action to help remove plaque. The shape and size of the kibble encourage chewing and added peppermint and parsley help keep your cat's breath fresh.

name: Tuna and cheese in broth for adult cats
description: This adult cat wet food is a delicious complement to dry food diets and is a good source of hydration. 100% natural and full of proteins, it is additives and sub-products free to preserve its high nutritional value and your pet's health. This food is composed of human grade ingredients and is conserved in its own broth. Tuna 71%, Cheese 5% and Cooking water 24%. Moisture: 80% Raw protein: 19% Raw fat: 1% Raw ash: 2% Raw fibre: 1%.

name: Hairball control chicken and rice formula for adult cat
description: Vetdiet® adult hairball control cat food is specifically formulated to help prevent hairballs for your cat. Made from natural ingredients, this formula contains: optimal fiber levels from miscanthus grass, pea fiber and psyllium to help control hairballs, omega-3 from flaxseed and fish oil for a healthy skin and coat, natural prebiotics to help support digestive health.

name: Hairball control chicken and rice formula for adult cat
description: Vetdiet® adult hairball control cat food is specifically formulated to help prevent hairballs for your cat. Made from natural ingredients, this formula contains: optimal fiber levels from miscanthus grass, pea fiber and psyllium to help control hairballs, omega-3 from flaxseed and fish oil for a healthy skin and coat, natural prebiotics to help support digestive health.

name: Skin and stomach health dry food for adult cat
description: Vetdiet® adult skin and stomach health grain-free cat food is specially formulated with salmon and other natural ingredients for cats with special digestive and dermal needs. This dry cat food contains: Limited sources of protein from fish for cats with specific needs, Omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids from salmon, fish oil and canola oil to help maintain skin and coat health, Chicory root extract, a natural source of prebiotics, to support digestive health.

name: Creamy Cat Lickable Treat, Chicken and Liver, 50-pack
description: Catit Creamy is a healthy and hydrating lickable treat, rich in amino acids. Serve on a dish or feed your cat directly from the tube as a special reward. Catit Creamy treats are natural, tasty and full of essential nutrients. Add some tasty variation to your cat's diet with Catit Creamy treats - delicious by itself or as a dry food topping.

name: Plus Squeezables cat treats, skin & coat
description: PureBites® Plus Squeezables Skin & Coat daily health support is made with only 5 high-quality ingredients; 100% pure & natural chicken, water, tapioca starch, sunflower oil, and tuna oil. Every pouch contains 113mg of omega-3 and 1,065mg of omega-6 to support skin and coat health. Made fresh and pure in a fun and interactive squeezable pouch that dispenses pure protein + functional ingredients with no mess or fuss.

name: Catnip Flavored Cat Treats
description: Your cat will love this catnip flavoured treat with no artificial flavours or colours. Crunchy on the outside and tender on the inside, cats will do anything for the great taste of the Treat Time cat treats. A shake of the pack and our feline will come purring with happiness. Crude protein: min 31.0%, crude fat: min 18.0%, crude fiber: max 5.0%, moisture: max 12.0%.

name: Yam Good Salmon
description: Shameless Pets is an all-natural, nutritionist-crafted, sustainable cat treat brand using upcycled ingredients such as sweet potatoes that are too big or too small to have made it to grocery store shelves. All of our products are made in the USA, and our mission is to save as much food as possible by combining healthy ingredients into innovative and fun treats. Crude Protein (min) 22%, Crude Fat (min) 10.5%, Crude Fiber (min) 4.5%, Moisture (max) 8%, Omega-6 Fatty Acids (min) 1.25%, Omega-3 Fatty Acids (min) 3.50%

name: Clumping litter
description: This litter is made of 100% natural clay and has an unparalleled odor control with its 'Smart Odor Shield' technology that neutralizes odours for up to 40 days. It has an excellent absorption rate, which makes it easy to scoop and clean.

name: Clumping Clay Litter
description: Made of premium quality bentonite clay, this litter clumps more effectively and offers better absorption. It clumps on contact with urine, which makes for easier scooping and lets you clean the litter box less frequently. Dust free and made of medium granules, it will not stick to your cat's paws for less tracking. In addition to controlling odours, this O'select Original litter is unscented, which most cats prefer.

name: Recycled jumbo scoop, grey
description: This jumbo scoop is designed to make cleaning easier. With ergonomic handle for comfortable use.

name: High Litter Box for Cats
description: This cat litter box was conceived to really reduce litter scatter and is great for large cat breeds and multi-cat households.

name: Buco+ Oral Health for Small Dogs and Cats
details: x56 1g pouches. For small dogs and cats up to 15 kg. 6 months and older
description: Buco+ helps to prevent and reduce: tartar, plaque and bad breath in dogs and cats. Buco+ is a product that is highly specific to the gingipain enzyme (a protease that damages tooth cavities and reduces natural oral defences). This very fast-acting product is natural, safe, has no aftertaste and is simple to use.

name: Topical flea protection for cat 4+ kg, 6 pack
description: A monthly topical flea treatment that works through contact so fleas don't have to bite to die. Controls fleas (including all life stages) and helps to protect against Flea Allergy Dermatitis (FAD). Available in three different sizes for kittens and cats. Advantage® II is not absorbed internally when applied to the skin on the back of the neck. It spreads in a thin layer and remains locked in the oil of the pets skin. Contact between fleas and the treated hair coat and skin results in paralysis and death of adult fleas. Advantage® II not only kills adult fleas through contact, the product also contains the insect growth regulator pyriproxyfen which is distributed into the home on fur and skin shed by the cat and prevents flea eggs and larvae from developing into the next stage of the flea life cycle, effectively killing them.

name: CATI CHA HERBE VAPO Catnip spray
description: Directions: Hold spray bottle 20-25 cm (8-10 in.) from object to be sprayed. Do not spray on the cat or any other animal. Do not spray on furniture (except cat furniture). Keep out of reach of children.

name: Deluxe nail trimmer for cats and small animals
description: Quality stainless steel ensures a long lasting, sharp cutting edge on our Safari Cat Deluxe Nail Trimmer. This cat nail trimmer provides ultimate comfort for more hand sizes with a larger finger hole, over-molded handle and non-slip finger rest. It is suitable for cats and small animals. This product allows you to safely trim your pet's claws for your peace of mind.

name: Citro Protect flean and tick repellent
details: 500g For domestic use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
description: Amazonia Pet Care Citro Protect is a natural Flea and Tick repellent. One of mother nature's most well-known shields, Citro Protect Natural Repellent can offer a natural insect repellent your pet needs without harsh chemicals and smells. A go-to in aromatherapy, it combines a fresh scent with rich Vitamin E and a number of other practical uses with its antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, antidepressant, antiseptic and fungicide properties. Protection without irritation is an application away (and you don't have to worry about it irritating your hands either).

name: Laxative paste for hairballs
details: 100g. This product is for veterinary use only.
description: This laxative paste aids in the prevention and the removal of the hairballs in cats. This product is for veterinary use only.

name: Scratching post
details: Dimensions when assembled : 33 x 33 x 61 cm
description: Help your cat fight boredom and maintain healthy claws with this simple and easy-to-carry post. It allows your cat to mark its territory without scratching your furniture!

name: Play 3-in-1 Circuit Ball Toy with Scratch Pad, Red
description: The Catit Play Circuit Ball Toy is a-3 in-1 activity toy that will entertain your kitty with hours of playtime. The 3-in-1 activity toy includes a: scratching pad, circuit ball toy, a bouncy bee and catnip.

name: Minou Bench Scratcher
details: Weight: 5kg. Dimensions : L. 36 x l. 36,5 x H. 40,5 cm
description: The Catit Vesper Minou is a horizontal scratcher and a two-entries hiding place in one. Thanks to its compact design, it can be placed near any object that you would like to prevent your cat from scratching.

name: Feline probiotic supplement
details: 30g. For cats of all sizes, orally administer by adding to food, one sachet daily. Not for long term use, unless directed by a Veterinarian
description: Purina Pro Plan Veterinary Supplements FortiFlora® Feline Probiotic Supplement contains a safe and effective strain of beneficial bacteria proven to promote normal intestinal microflora. FortiFlora® is the #1 probiotic brand recommended by veterinarians*. The science behind our therapeutic products represents a collaboration between Purina nutritionists, researchers and veterinarians.

name: Fish Toy with Feather and Catnip
description: Turbo Cat offer a wide variety of toys made of materials such as feathers, sponge, plastic and fuzzy fabrics. Select toys feature rattle and crinkling sounds. These features will quickly make these toys among your cat's favorites.

name: Cat scratching tunnel
description: Plush-covered scratching tunnel for cats

name: Cat Collar, Fishes
description: Spiff your cat up with this high-quality designer collar. It is adjustable with a built in safety elastic to avoid your cat getting stuck. It also has a bell to easily find your little furry friend!

name: Mesh Cat Harness, Black
details: Size: Girth Medium: 25 - 38 cm, Large: 33 45 cm
description: Gorgeous black Cloe Cluzo adjustable mesh cat harness. Great for special occasions and everyday fun! Since it is made of mesh, the fabric breathes for your pet's comfort.

name: Ergonomic cat double bowl feeder
details: L: 27.5 cm x W: 13.5 cm x H: 14 cm
description: The ergonomic Cloe e Cluzo double bowl for cats improves food digestion and helps prevent acid reflux. The tilting design helps to solve long-term spinal problems. Bowls are removable and dishwasher safe.

name: Salmon dry food for adult dogs Skin and stomach health
description: Vetdiet adult skin and Stomach health grain-free dog food is specially formulated with fresh salmon and other natural ingredients to help support dogs with specific needs. Omega-3 and omega-6 from salmon, fish oil and vegetable oil promote a healthy skin and coat while chicory root extract, a natural source of prebiotics, helps support your dog's digestive health. Ingredients such as sweet potatoes and peas also provide a source of easily digestible carbohydrates.

name: Salmon dry food for adult dogs Skin and stomach health
description: Vetdiet adult skin and Stomach health grain-free dog food is specially formulated with fresh salmon and other natural ingredients to help support dogs with specific needs. Omega-3 and omega-6 from salmon, fish oil and vegetable oil promote a healthy skin and coat while chicory root extract, a natural source of prebiotics, helps support your dog's digestive health. Ingredients such as sweet potatoes and peas also provide a source of easily digestible carbohydrates.

name: Chicken dry food for adult large breed dog
description: Vetdiet adult large breed dog food is specially formulated with fresh deboned chicken, whole grains and other natural ingredients to meet the specific nutritional needs of your dog. It offers an ideal balance of energy and nutrients to support healthy vitality, as well as optimal levels of omega-3 and omega-6 from flaxseed and fish oil, which contribute to a healthy skin and coat. Your dog will also benefit from New Zealand green mussels, glucosamine and chondroitin that help support joint health.

name: Chicken Wet Food for Senior Dogs
description: Vetdiet® senior canned chicken dog food is prepared with chicken and other natural ingredients, including whole grains and real pieces of carrots, peas and potatoes. It contains the perfect balance of nutrients, vitamins and minerals to meet the specific nutritional needs of senior dogs.

name: Hypoallergenic dry duck food for dogs
description: Duck HYPOALLERGENIC formula has been designed to meet the needs of adult dogs who suffer from food allergies, intolerances, or need to avoid grains. To make sure this formula is gentle on the stomach, our animal nutrition expert team has carefully chosen easily digested ingredients that rarely cause allergic reactions. The ideal soluble and insoluble fiber ratio promotes intestinal health so that dogs feel good and full of energy!

name: Hypoallergenic dry duck food for dogs
description: Duck HYPOALLERGENIC formula has been designed to meet the needs of adult dogs who suffer from food allergies, intolerances, or need to avoid grains. name: Large Adult Dry Dog Food
description: MAXI Adult is formulated to meet the unique nutritional needs of large breed dogs over 15 months old, between 56 and 100 lbs.

name: Lamb, pork and sweet potatoes wet food for dog
description: MAXI Adult is formulated to meet the unique nutritional needs of large breed dogs over 15 months old, between 56 and 100 lbs.

name: Chicken dry food for adult dogs
description: Formulated for the health and well-being of dogs, BLUE Life Protection Formula is made with the finest natural ingredients and features: Delicious, protein-rich, Deboned Chicken, Wholesome whole grains, garden veggies and fruit, NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, NO corn, wheat or soy, NO artificial  flavours or preservatives

name: Rawhide medium pressed bone
description: These 100% natural pressed beef rawhide bones are a must-have for your companion's oral health. They help clean teeth and gums and reduce tartar build-up. They are also good for massaging, and activating blood microcirculation. Moreover, your dog will be entertained for hours and chewing bones helps reduce anxiety. Finally, here's a treat you can give your dog to make him happy and contribute to his health! This product contains 5 medium bones.

name: Chicken Necks Dog Treats
description: HeroDogTreats™ - Dehydrated Chicken Necks, A popular crunchy treat great for small to medium sized breeds.

name: Tiny Bits Soft and Chewy Training Treats For Dogs
description: Tiny soft and chewy all natural liver treats for training dogs.

name: Hooded pet bed
description: Our luxurious silk-like plush hooded bed with inside ultra soft sherpa provides comfort and security and is ideal for cats and small dogs. The snuggly hood traps your pet's body heat for a super cozy and warm sleeping spot allowing them to enjoy a restful sleep for better behaviour and health.

name: Grey swirl fur pet bed
description: The luxurious Gray Swirl Fur Dog Bed works great as a pet bed or inside a dog crate to create a comfortable home for your pet. This ultra-soft synthetic pet bed provides extra comfort in their crate by making them love their place. It's designed for machine washing and comes with a one-year quality warranty from the MidWest manufacturer.

name: Sterling lounge bed, black
description: Refined, sleek, contemporary design. Elegant scalloped edge trim detail. We use only high memory super loft fiberfill, no foam chips or batting. The Sterling bed is offered in a coordinated collection of durable upholstery fabric neutrals, that represent the most current trends in home design. Removable zippered cover for easy machine washing and drying.

name: Octopus Dog Toy
description: This BeOneBreed plush dog toy comes with an integrated squeaker, crackle material and rope for more durability. It is Multitexturized for discovery and stimulation. It is the perfect way to play with your pet. Ideal for medium and big dogs.

name: Latex pig for dogs
description: A classic toy to make your dog play: this latex pig is stuffed with polyester and makes a squeaking sound. Watch your dog chase, chew and catch his new friend!

name: Simple tennis ball
description: Black and yellow tennis ball made of durable materials, bouncing and non toxic glue. This classic toy will allow your dog to bring back without tiring, for hours of pleasure with him.

name: Double door dog crate with divider and pan
description: MidWest designs each dog and puppy product with precision and quality in mind, thinking of pets and also pet parents. Every dog and puppy is unique in his or her habits and lifestyles, which is why we offer a variety of products. The ConTour crates include two reinforced doors with multiple lock points and safe & secure slide bolt latches for easy access to pet, versatile placement in your home and to increase security.

description: MidWest designs each dog and puppy product with precision and quality in mind, thinking of pets and also pet parents. name: Retractable Dog Leash
description: Flexi's Neon leash allows you to be visible at all times when walking with your dog: Length 5m, Neon yellow reflective stickers, For dogs up to 25 kg, Customizable with LED light and storage box for treats or poop bags.

name: Silicone collapsible bowl, blue
description: Super soft silicone yet rigid when expanded. Enclosed stainless steel rim for added rigidity. Includes quick release carabeaner clip to hook on to leashes, belts, backpacks etc. Collapses to less than 1 inch. Made from FDA approved food-grade silicone. BPA and PVC free. Dishwasher safe

name: Adjustable mesh harness
description: Gorgeous fushia Cloe Cluzo adjustable mesh harness. Great for special occasions and everyday fun! Since it is made of mesh, the fabric breathes for your pet's comfort.

name: Adjustable mesh harness
description: Gorgeous fushia Cloe Cluzo adjustable mesh harness. Great for special occasions and everyday fun! Since it is made of mesh, the fabric breathes for your pet's comfort.

name: Optifit headcollar
details: Neck Size: Small: 24 - 40 cm, Medium: 42 - 54 cm, Large: 48 - 64 cm
description: The Halti Optifit Headcollar designed by Dr Roger Mugford guarantees to stop your dog pulling. The pack includes a Halti Optifit Headcollar, a fitting guide and a Halti safety link which connects to the dogs' collar for extra security. Specially designed to provide an ergonomic and comfortable fit, the adjustable chin-strap, with secure camlock, allows a customised fitting for every dog. The uniquely styled cheek straps which follow the contours of a dogs face, stop the Optifit rising into the dogs eyes or sliding down to his lips (flews). Additional padding on the noseband, ensures extra comfort and reflective webbing  on the side strips help provide additional visibility. Designed to fit most dogs from short nosed Boxers to long nosed Borzoi's, the Halti Optifit provides maximum comfort and optimum fit no matter what the shape or size.

name: Dematter tool for dogs and cats
description: This tool safely and easily removes dogs and cats matted hair. The dematting edges adjust to accommodate all pet hair lengths. The cutting edge is curved for added safety.

name: Topical Flea and Tick Protection for Dogs
details: Dogs >8 weeks of age weighing >25 kg b.w.: 4 mL applicator contents evenly to 6-8 spots on top of back from shoulder to base of tail.
description: Bayer K9 Advantix® II controls fleas, ticks and lice on dogs within one day of treatment and will continue to protect the dog from further flea, tick and lice infestations for at least four weeks. K9 Advantix® II also reduces biting by mosquitoes and stable flies; and kills mosquitoes. K9 Advantix® II is applied to the skin down the back of the dog. From there, it spreads evenly as a thin layer over the skin surface and is locked in the oils of the dog's skin rather than being absorbed internally. When parasites such as fleas, ticks, mosquitoes and lice come in contact with the skin of a treated dog, the parasites' nervous system becomes affected. The parasites quickly become uncoordinated and die. K9 Advantix® II works through contact and does not require the pest to start feeding on your pet in order to be killed. Reducing biting keeps pets comfortable and can help to prevent disease transmission.

name: Stainless steel scissor style nail trimmer for medium to large dogs
description: Our Safari Professional Stainless Steel Dog Nail Trimmers are made from the finest quality stainless steel to give a long-lasting, sharp cutting edge. Nail trimming should be a regular part of your dog's grooming. It is important to your pet's well-being to keep the nails properly trimmed. This green tool will allow you to safely cut your dog's claws. It is suitable for medium and large dogs. This product is also available for small and medium dogs.

name: Oral Flea Treatment for Small Dogs and Cats, 1 - 11 kg, 6 pack
details: Ingredients: Nitenpyram. For cats and dogs 4 weeks of age or older.
description: Capstar is a fast-acting flea treatment tablet for use in dogs and cats that starts killing fleas in only 30 minutes.* A single dose of Capstar kills 98% of fleas on the pet within 6 hours, and 100% of fleas within 24 hours. For continuous flea protection, use a monthly topical flea treatment like Advantage II.Capstar can be safely administered to dogs, cats, puppies and kittens four weeks of age and older, pregnant or lactating females and breeding male and female dogs and cats. To give Capstar tablets, place the oral tablet directly in your pet's mouth or mix with your pet's favourite food. The label contains complete use information, including cautions and warnings. Always read, understand and follow the label and use directions.
